name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

name: Barbtooth Wurm
flavor_text: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

name: Bog Raiders
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

name: Border Guard
flavor_text: "Join the army, see foreign countries!" they'd said.

name: Chorus of Woe
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

name: Coral Eel
flavor_text: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

name: Dakmor Scorpion
flavor_text: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe *around* your boot, but not *in* it.

name: Devoted Hero
flavor_text: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

name: Devout Monk
oracle_text: When Devout Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Discipline wears many robes.

name: Durkwood Boars
flavor_text:
"And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine: and the herd ran violently . . . ."
—*The Bible*, Mark 5:13

name: Eager Cadet
flavor_text: The enthusiasm of the young, sharpened by the discipline of a soldier.

name: Extinguish
oracle_text: Counter target sorcery spell.

name: Feral Shadow
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

name: Foot Soldiers
flavor_text: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

name: Giant Octopus
flavor_text: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

name: Goblin Cavaliers
flavor_text: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

name: Goblin Chariot
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: They have to replace the wheels, they have to replace the boar, and sometimes they have to replace the goblin.

name: Goblin Hero
flavor_text: When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero—everyone else just has to step back.

name: Goblin Mountaineer
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

name: Gorilla Warrior
flavor_text: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

name: Hand of Death
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: The touch of death is never gentle.

name: Hollow Dogs
oracle_text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

name: Hulking Goblin
oracle_text: Hulking Goblin can't block.
flavor_text: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

name: Ingenious Thief
oracle_text:
Flying
When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

name: Knight Errant
flavor_text:
". . . Before honor is humility."
—*The Bible*, Proverbs 15:33

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

name: Lone Wolf
oracle_text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
flavor_text: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

name: Muck Rats
flavor_text:
"Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."
—Foot soldier

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us.

name: Norwood Archers
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."
—Elvish scout

name: Norwood Ranger
flavor_text: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

name: Ogre Warrior
flavor_text: Assault and battery included.

name: Path of Peace
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
—Former soldier

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: When your enemies are denied soldiers, they are denied victory.

name: Royal Falcon
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Hunter by instinct, weapon by training.

name: Sacred Nectar
oracle_text: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

name: Scathe Zombies
flavor_text: Luckily for them, it doesn't take much brains to slaughter and maim.

name: Scorching Spear
oracle_text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

name: Sea Eagle
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: A hiss before dying.

name: Sleight of Hand
oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Drakes claim to be dragons—until the dragons show up.

name: Southern Elephant
flavor_text: Neither predator nor prey, the elephant chooses its place in the battle.

name: Squall
oracle_text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"To-night the winds begin to rise . . . The rooks are blown about the skies . . . ."
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, *In Memoriam*

name: Steadfastness
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Brute force wins the battles. Conviction wins the wars.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

name: Touch of Brilliance
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I *do* have."

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Willow Elf
flavor_text: The forest lives in the elf as the elf lives in the forest.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."
—William Blake, *The Marriage of Heaven and Hell*
